content.query:
--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Cardio_Disease] AS
SELECT [California County] as County, 
--, [ZIP]
--, [Nearby City (to help approximate location only)]
SUM(cast([Cardiovascular Disease] as FLOAT)) as [Cardio Disease]
--, [Cardiovascular Disease Pctl]
FROM [dbo].[calenviroscreen]
--where [California County] = 'Ventura'
group by [California County]
--order by [Cardio Disease] desc

--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Covid_Deaths] AS
SELECT
--[date]
[area] as County, cast([cumulative_deaths] as FLOAT) as [Covid Deaths]
--[cumulative_deaths]
 FROM [dbo].[Covid19CasesTest]
 where area_type != 'State' and date = '' 
 --and area = 'Los Angeles' 


select c.County, c.[Cardio Disease], 
--cast(d.[Covid Deaths] as numeric)
--convert(decimal(18,2),[Covid Deaths])
--d.[Covid Deaths] as numeric
--isNumeric(d.[Covid Deaths])
d.[Covid Deaths]
from dbo.County_Cardio_Disease c, dbo.County_Covid_Deaths d
where c.County = d.County
order by d.[Covid Deaths] desc
